actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 401(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain service performed by ministers.

summary.text: Provides that ministers shall be treated as self-employed individuals for the purposes of qualified pension, profit-sharing, and stock bonus plans under the Internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 401(c)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 401(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain service performed by ministers.
